rationale: Restructured AVN/metabolic section into mechanism-first framework with preserved comparison table and MRI priority.
Condensed osteomyelitis and tumor location game into context-specific infection and hallmark lesion patterns.

Kept PMR/myositis/MG/LEMS contrasts with crisis triggers and malignancy links.
Rebuilt rapid recap into exam-critical condition-action table and removed non-learning reflection.
Merged pediatric-orthopedics framework with limping-child/JIA essentials and restored explicit JIA subtype table.
Preserved alignment/intoeing/clubfoot and pediatric developmental red flags in structured table format.
